When I try to do a Fourier analysis of a WAV file with a sample rate of 22050 I get an error "Cannot take positions". What am doing wrong?               In[5]:= Import[path,"Options"]     Out[5]= {AudioChannels->1,AudioEncoding->Integer16,SampleRate->22050}          In[13]:= ListLinePlot[Abs[Fourier[signal2[[0;;22050]]]]]     During evaluation of
